title: BRIEF-China Crystal New Material Holdings declares semiannual dividend as 29.8 won per share
author: Reuters Staff
description: China Crystal New Material Holdings Co., Ltd. :
cleaned_text: Aug 8 (Reuters) - China Crystal New Material Holdings Co., Ltd. : * Says it declares to pay semiannual dividend as 29.8 won per share to shareholders recorded on Aug. 5 * Says total dividend amount is 1.84 billion won Source text in Korean: [goo.gl/jYmzqd](http://goo.gl/jYmzqd) Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
